text: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
author: Anne Frank

text: Beauty is not caused. It is.
author: Emily Dickinson

text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
author: Leo Tolstoy
